means: 包围( surround的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The heated gas is piped through a coil surrounded by water.
sentence.Network_cn: 受热气体通过水中的盘管输送。

sentence.Network_en: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence.
sentence.Network_cn: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

sentence.Network_en: In the cosy consulting room the children are surrounded by familiar objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 在温馨的诊疗室里，孩子们周围摆满了亲切熟悉的东西。

PerfectNetExp.abs: A rural village , typically consisting of huts surrounded by a stockade ., 栅栏村庄一种乡间的村庄 , 一般由被栅栏围住的茅屋组成.
you found... ... Lying on the floor 躺在地上, surrounded,surrounded 被包围住,被包围 Whyd you have to wait? 为什么你要等.
therefore art thou surrounded with snares , and sudden fear troubleth thee .因此罗网要四面围困你，恐吓突降，使你惊惶。

standing on ground north of Castle Point , How Stella Bay this Loess Plateau is surrounded by water like a peninsula of the Yellow River and its insertion into the tributaries .站在古堡的制高点上北望，老牛湾这片三面环水的黄土塬犹如一个半岛插入黄河和它的支流之中。

list.abs: 王陆807听力单词精选_百度文库 ... unemployment n. 失业 surroundings n. 环境 powerlessness n. 无力感.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... surround vt. 围绕； 包围 surrounding a. 周围的 suspect n. 犯罪嫌疑人.
采矿工程专业英语词汇手册 - 豆丁网 ... center rise 中央上山 surrounding rock 围岩 maintenance n. 维护.
字典中回字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ whirl;circle] (4) 环绕; 包围[ surround] (6) 掉转[ turn round].
字典中回字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ whirl;circle] (4) 环绕; 包围[ surround] (6) 掉转[ turn round].

entry.def: If a person or thing is surrounded by something, that thing is situated all around them.

example.ex: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence...
example.tran: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

example.ex: The shell surrounding the egg has many important functions.
example.tran: 蛋壳有许多重要的功能。

entry.def: If you are surrounded by soldiers or police, they spread out so that they are in positions all the way around you.

example.ex: When the car stopped in the town square it was surrounded by soldiers and militiamen...
example.tran: 当汽车停在城镇广场时立刻被士兵和民兵包围了。

example.ex: He tried to run away but gave up when he found himself surrounded...
example.tran: 他试图逃跑，但发现已被包围时只好放弃了这个念头。

entry.def: The circumstances, feelings, or ideas which surround something are those that are closely associated with it.

example.ex: The decision had been agreed in principle before today's meeting, but some controversy surrounded it...
example.tran: 该决定在今天的会议之前就已达成原则上的共识，但围绕这一决定还存在一些争议。

example.ex: Once the euphoria surrounding this victory subsides, reality must return.
example.tran: 这场胜利的喜悦退去后，人们将不得不回归现实。

entry.tran: 喜欢结交(某类人);确保身边总有(某类东西)
entry.def: If you surround yourself with certain people or things, you make sure that you have a lot of them near you all the time.

example.ex: He had made it his business to surround himself with a hand-picked group of bright young officers...
example.tran: 他总会亲手挑选一批聪明而年轻的军官常伴他左右。

example.ex: They love being surrounded by familiar possessions.
example.tran: 他们喜欢身边都是自己熟悉的物品。

entry.def: The surround of something such as a fireplace is the border, wall, or shelves around it.

example.ex: ...a small fireplace with a cast-iron surround.
The entire team enjoyed hot showers in the spacious surrounds of a new, modern village hall.
example.tran: 全队都在新建的现代化村会所的宽敞洗浴间享受了热水淋浴。

auth_sentence.content: They are surrounded by smartphones, laptops and tablets.

auth_sentence.content: There, a new government is surrounded by uncertainty.
auth_sentence.res_content: There, a new government is surrounded by uncertainty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There, a new government is surrounded by uncertainty.

auth_sentence.content: In the spare bedroom...surrounded by more and more objects.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the spare bedroom...surrounded by more and more objects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the spare bedroom...surrounded by more and more objects.

Sentence.sentence: In a New York Times article, Sam Boakye – the only black student on his freshman year floor -said that "if you're surrounded by whites, you have something to prove.
Being surrounded by white peers motivates a black student to work harder to succeed
Placed in an insulated (隔绝的) case and surrounded by a quarter-inch-thick panels of stainless steel, the boxes can withstand massive force and temperatures up to 2,000℉.
Surrounded by open ocean, it is also vulnerable, but Antarctic experts disagree strongly on just how unstable it is.
